towel.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a piece of cloth that you use for drying your skin or for drying things such as dishes
towel.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Have you got a clean towel I could use?
She dried her hands on the kitchen towel.
towel.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to dry yourself using a towel
towel.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: He stood in the doorway, towelling his hair dry.
